resources.string: We strongly not encourage short selling. Are you sure want to proceed?

Warning!!!

-Cancel order will make customer unable to search the canceled products and label as sold out. 
-System will refund canceled order item money to our customer and the refund cost will pay by merchant.
-each cancelation consider short selling
-when number of short selling reached our threshold limit, merchant account will be freezed for investigation 

Are you sure want to cancel order?
canceling customer order, existing item will not be shown to customer, please wait
